title: Dialogue-Based Feedback Training to Strengthen Academic Peer Review Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in research methodologies and basic academic writing skills
context.additional_context: Asynchronous collaborative learning environment utilizing personal devices for undergraduate students conducting social science research

learning_goals: Explain at least three criteria for evaluating methodological rigor and academic contribution of research papers
Communicate improvement directions for authors' research with over 80% clarity through constructive language in feedback
Practice applying objective evaluation systems to judge research impact using peer review rubrics at least twice
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
